author: James Joyce
text: Dear Stannie, I am trying to get a position in Marseilles as I could travel cheap from Naples. I would answer advts but cannot lay out even the few pence needed for stamps. I fancy I will not find it so difficult to get a position but perhaps I am too sanguine. I hope you answered my card of yesterday as I can barely reach Thursday evg: in fact, I can’t but your reply could not come sooner. I expected a letter from you today. Jim
